item.title: 中国股市将迎来 2008 年以来最好的一周；日本领导层角逐成为焦点
item.description: 随着中国政府推出振兴经济的巨额刺激计划，中国股市将迎来自2008年以来最好的一周，亚洲股市也因此升至两年半以来的高点，而油价的大幅下跌则预示着全球通货紧缩将得到缓解。【原文：Chinese stocks are headed for the best week since 2008 as Beijing rolled out a huge stimulus package to revive the economy, lifting Asian shares to 2-1/2-year highs, while a sharp fall in oil prices bodes well for disinflation globally.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡保持利率稳定，等待新总统明确政策
item.description: 斯里兰卡央行周五维持利率不变，与预期一致，因为这个岛国在选出新总统带领其走出数十年来最严重的金融危机之后，正等待政策的明朗化。【原文：Sri Lanka's central bank kept interest rates unchanged on Friday in line with expectations as the island nation waits for policy clarity after electing a new president to steer it out of the worst financial crisis in decades.】

item.title: 中国乐观情绪提振美元走势，风险敏感型货币受到提振
item.description: 周五，美元走势摇摆不定，有望连续第四周下跌，因为投资者在权衡美国数据以衡量降息步伐的同时，中国的一系列刺激措施使对风险敏感的货币保持高位。【原文：The dollar wobbled on Friday, poised for a fourth straight week of declines as investors weighed U.S. data to gauge the pace of interest rate cuts, while China's spree of stimulus measures kept risk-sensitive currencies aloft.】

item.title: 8 月中国工业利润增速重回下降通道
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，中国 8 月份的工业利润再次出现大幅萎缩。【原文：China's industrial profits swung back to a sharp contraction in August, official data showed on Friday, adding to a recent spate of bleak readings that point to mounting pressure on the economy.】

item.title: 机队和座位陈旧，供应问题阻碍印度航空扭亏为盈
item.description: 塔塔集团（Tata Group）以 24 亿美元的价格收购印度航空公司两年后，重新装备老化的机队、零部件短缺和持续的航班延误阻碍了这家前国有航空公司成为 "世界级航空公司 "的目标。【原文：Two years after Tata Group took control of Air India in a $2.4 billion deal, re-kitting an ageing fleet amid parts shortages and persistent flight delays stand in the way of the former state-owned carrier's intent to become "a world class airline".】

item.title: 供应增加预期打击市场情绪，油价下跌
item.description: 周五，油价连续第三天下跌，预计本周结束时将走低，原因是投资者关注利比亚和更广泛的欧佩克+石油出口国集团供应增加的预期。【原文：Oil prices fell for a third day on Friday, on course to end the week lower, as investors focused on expectations of higher supplies from Libya and the broader OPEC+ group of oil exporters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司亏损数十亿美元后暴跌
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚第二大赌场运营商星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）股价暴跌超过 50%，创下历史新低，该公司是在因场地价值减记而连续第二次出现数十亿美元年度亏损后恢复交易的。【原文：Shares in Australia's no.2 casino operator Star Entertainment slumped over 50% to a record low on Friday, as it resumed trading a day after posting a second straight multi-billion-dollar annual loss on a write-down in its venues' value.】

item.title: 中国从 9 月 27 日起下调银行存款准备金率 50 个基点
item.description: 中国央行周五表示，将把银行必须持有的现金储备额度下调50个基点，这是今年以来的第二次下调，目的是支持摇摇欲坠的经济增长。【原文：China's central bank said on Friday it would cut the amount of cash that banks must hold as reserves by 50 basis points, the second reduction this year aimed at bolstering faltering economic growth.】

item.title: 日本首都的核心通胀率符合日本央行的目标
item.description: 数据显示，9 月份日本首都的核心通胀率达到了央行 2% 的目标，这表明日本经济在达到进一步加息的标准方面正在取得进展。【原文：Core inflation in Japan's capital matched the central bank's 2% target in September, data showed, a sign the economy is making progress in meeting the criteria for further interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 好市多表示为应对美国港口罢工做了 "各种准备
item.description: 美国零售商好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）首席执行官周四表示，该公司正在采取各种措施，为下周美国东海岸和墨西哥湾港口可能发生的罢工做好准备。【原文：U.S. retailer Costco Wholesale is taking a wide variety of steps to prepare for possible strikes next week at U.S. ports on the East Coast and Gulf of Mexico, the company's chief executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: Moncler 首席执行官通过与路威酩轩集团的交易加强对公司的掌控
item.description: Moncler 主席兼首席执行官雷莫-鲁菲尼（Remo Ruffini）与路威酩轩集团（LVMH）达成协议，后者将与鲁菲尼合作出资扩大对这家意大利公司的投资，从而加强对这家外衣专家的控制。【原文：Moncler's Chairman and CEO Remo Ruffini is tightening his control of the outerwear specialist after striking a deal with LVMH , which will partner with Ruffini to fund an expanded investment in the Italian company.】

item.title: 美联储主席库克表示 "全心全意 "支持降息半点
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周四支持美国央行上周降息50个基点，认为这是应对就业 "下行风险 "增加的一种方式。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook on Thursday endorsed the U.S. central bank's 50-basis-point interest-rate cut last week as a way to address increased "downside risks" to employment.】

item.title: 康涅狄格州商人在巴西国家石油公司贿赂案中被判有罪
item.description: 美国检察官称，一名康涅狄格州的石油和天然气交易商周四被判有罪，他在近八年的时间里一直在策划贿赂巴西国有石油公司（Petrobras）的官员，以便康涅狄格州的两家贸易公司能够赢得业务。【原文：A Connecticut oil and gas trader was convicted on Thursday over a nearly eight-year scheme to bribe officials at Brazil's state-owned oil company Petrobras so two Connecticut trading companies could win business, U.S. prosecutors said.】

item.title: 早间竞价飙升的中国股市将迎来十年来最好的一周
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: DraftKings 因信息披露违规支付 20 万美元：美国证券交易委员会
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周四宣布，体育博彩公司 DraftKings 因选择性地在社交媒体账户上而非向所有投资者披露重大非公开信息，已同意支付 20 万美元罚款。【原文：Sports betting company DraftKings has agreed to pay a $200,000 penalty for selectively disclosing material non-public information on social media accounts rather than to all investors, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会指控木薯科学公司误导阿尔茨海默氏症药物试验，导致其股价下跌
item.description: 在美国证券交易委员会指控这家生物制药公司和两名前高管在阿尔茨海默氏症临床试验结果方面存在误导性声明之后，Cassava Sciences 公司的股票在周四的盘后交易中下跌了 10%。【原文：Shares of Cassava Sciences fell 10% in post-market trading on Thursday after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charged the biopharmaceutical company and two former executives for misleading claims about the results of Alzheimer's clinical trials.】

item.title: 纽瓦克事件后，NTSB 就波音 737 飞机方向舵提出紧急安全建议
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）周四发布紧急安全建议，指出在今年 2 月美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）一架航班发生事故后，一些波音 737 飞机的方向舵控制系统有可能被卡住。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board on Thursday issued urgent safety recommendations about the potential for a jammed rudder control system on some Boeing 737 airplanes after a February incident involving a United Airlines flight.】

item.title: 备忘录称戴尔要求全球销售团队每周在办公室工作五天
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，戴尔科技公司周四表示，从 9 月 30 日开始，其全球销售团队中能够在公司办公室工作的员工必须每周工作五天。【原文：Dell Technologies said on Thursday that their global sales team employees who are able to work from the company offices must do so five days a week, starting Sept. 30, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，亚马逊视频流服务广告支出承诺目标突破 18 亿美元
item.description: The Information 周四援引一位直接了解亚马逊广告销售工作的人士的话报道称，亚马逊已经超额完成了明年为其视频流服务吸引 18 亿美元广告支出的目标。【原文：Amazon has exceeded its goal of attracting $1.8 billion in ad-spending commitments on its video-streaming services for next year, The Information reported on Thursday citing a person with direct knowledge of the company's ad sales efforts.】

item.title: 内部人士减持特朗普媒体公司的主要股份
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）旗下媒体公司的一位主要内部人士在最近结束出售限制后，几乎全部减持了公司股份。【原文：A major insider in former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company has all but eliminated its stake following the recent end of selling restrictions.】

item.title: 纽约联储主席珀利称美联储缩减持仓还有很大空间
item.description: 负责管理美联储持有的大量现金和债券的官员周四表示，在缩减央行资产负债表方面可能还有很大的空间。【原文：The official responsible for managing the Federal Reserve’s massive holdings of cash and bonds said on Thursday there’s likely plenty of room left to run in shrinking the central bank balance sheet.】

item.title: 好市多批发公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）周四公布的第四季度营收不及市场预期，原因是注重预算的顾客在其会员制商店消费谨慎，以及汽油价格下跌的影响。【原文：Costco Wholesale missed market expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday on cautious spending by budget-conscious customers at its membership-only stores, as well as an impact from lower gasoline prices.】

item.title: 精神航空在波音罢工中审查有关裁员的应急计划
item.description: 波音公司的主要供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司发言人乔-布奇诺（Joe Buccino）周四表示，该公司正在审查有关裁员的应急计划，并补充说目前尚未做出任何决定。【原文：Key Boeing supplier Spirit AeroSystems is reviewing its contingency plans regarding furloughs, company spokesperson Joe Buccino said on Thursday, adding that no decisions has been made at this time.】

item.title: 据法院官员称，Smartmatic 已与 Newsmax 的诽谤案达成和解
item.description: 特拉华州高等法院的一位社区发言人周四表示，投票机公司 Smartmatic 已就其与保守派广播公司 Newsmax Media 的诽谤案达成和解，但未提供更多细节。【原文：Voting machine company Smartmatic has settled its defamation case against conservative broadcaster Newsmax Media, a community spokesperson for Delaware Superior Court said on Thursday, without providing further details.】

item.title: Alphabet 将投资 33 亿美元在南卡罗来纳州建设两个数据中心
item.description: Alphabet 首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）表示，Alphabet 计划投资 33 亿美元在南卡罗来纳州新建两个数据中心。【原文：Alphabet plans to invest $3.3 billion in South Carolina to build two new data centers, CEO Sundar Pichai said, at a time when the Google parent and its rivals invest heavily in infrastructure supporting the development of AI applications.】

item.title: OpenAI 主席称董事会已讨论过首席执行官 Sam Altman 的股权补偿问题
item.description: OpenAI 董事长布雷特-泰勒（Bret Taylor）周四表示，董事会已经讨论过是否用股权补偿首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman），但尚未做出决定。【原文：OpenAI's chairman Bret Taylor on Thursday said the board has discussed whether to compensate CEO Sam Altman with equity but no decision has been made.】

item.title: TPG 以 10 亿美元估值收购财富管理公司 Homrich Berg 少数股权
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，TPG 已同意收购 Homrich Berg 的少数股权，该交易对这家财富管理公司的估值约为 10 亿美元。【原文：TPG has agreed to buy a minority stake in Homrich Berg, in a deal that values the wealth management firm at around $1 billion, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国首次公开募股稳健反弹后将延续复苏势头
item.description: 受经济衰退担忧消退和股市飙升的推动，美国首次公开募股市场在经历了近两年的枯竭期后，于 2024 年强劲反弹。【原文：The U.S. IPO market has bounced back strongly in 2024 after a nearly two-year dry spell, driven by receding recession fears and a searing rally in stocks.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款跌至 6.08%，创 2022 年 9 月以来新低
item.description: 本周，美国抵押贷款利率降至两年来的最低点，这可能会进一步推动再融资活动，尽管许多潜在购房者仍持观望态度。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates edged down to a two-year low this week, which could provide a further boost to refinancing activity, though many potential home buyers remain on the sidelines.】

item.title: 中国刺激政策、强势黄金令白银连涨，但并非没有风险
item.description: 在金银牛市和中国经济刺激措施的推动下，白银价格已涨至十多年来的最高点，但一些分析师预计，由于工业部门的需求仍令人担忧，白银价格的涨势将逐渐减弱。【原文：Silver prices have bubbled up to their highest in over a decade on the back of bullion's stellar bull run and China's stimulus measures, although some analysts expect the rally to fade as industrial sector demand remains a concern.】
